items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegant Stylish Dress
items.body: This dress fits true to size and has a very flattering cut. The strapless top stays in place well with a good grip, so it feels secure without constant adjusting. The high split adds a touch of elegance while keeping the style modern and eye catching. The fabric drapes nicely and looks great for formal occasions. It’s comfortable enough to wear for hours, and the overall design makes it a chic choice for prom, parties, or any event where you want a polished look. Read more
items.author: Jackie

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress!
items.body: A little sheer so I bought a slip to go underneath, but very comfortable and fit well. I'm looking forward to wearing it to another wedding coming up. Read more
items.author: Jessica C.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegant, Eye-Catching & Perfect for Special Occasions
items.body: I wore this dress to a formal dance and received so many compliments every detail felt just right. The vivid color and sleek strapless design framed my figure beautifully, and the overall style felt both glamorous and refined. The slit is high, which added drama and flow to every step. That said, I pinned it strategically to avoid any wardrobe mishaps. The pin worked seamlessly, and even in photos, no one would notice it just preserved elegance without overexposing. The material has a lovely stretch and structure, offering support while keeping everything in place. I felt comfortable and confident all night, and the backless cut added a tasteful hint of sophistication. According to the product description, the high-slit and strapless bustier design are meant to accentuate your figure and add a sexy, dressy flair and I can confirm it delivered on that promise beautifully. If you’re looking for a dress that captures attention, flatters your body, and offers formal dance appeal, this one hits the mark. Strong 5 stars for style, fit, and all-around presence. Read more
items.author: Momma reviews

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars poor sizing
items.body: For the price the fabric is not bad, however, the sizing is off. I am 5'7" and 125lbs and the dress was huge on me. The chest fit and the length was great, however, the waist and hips were about 6 inches too large. Overall, not proportional at all and the waist does not cinch in by any means. Read more
items.author: Matt Turner

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Looks Like the Pic
items.body: It's a pretty dress for a hot (super hot) Summer by the water when you want to put on something that looks nice when you wouldn't mind it getting a little messy. The fabric is thick enough that you wouldn't necessarily have to wear anything underneath if you don't want to. The unfinished hemlines have me personally thinking of these items as more of a 'work in progress' type of item. It will fit perfectly if you're more suited to straight sizing, but if you tend to carry more on the top or bottom you'll obviously need to order yours based on your biggest measurement. That's what I did when I opted for a medium. I will have to re-fit it in some places, but the overall fit is comfortable and doesn't deviate from the overall silhouette of the dress. It's nice and long at a maxi length as a taller person, so I think it'd definitely need some kind of platform or heel if you're not tall... It's wrinkly guys, I can't misprepresent that. I've had to re-iron this twice on a single day because of how wrinkle prone it's been. I think I would have chosen a different dress for what this listing usually asks but becaue I got this one on a deal and was drawn to the overall look, I find the price and quality fair. Read more
items.author: Autumn

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flattering dress.
items.body: Lovely dress. Size was perfect and fit great. Comfortable to wear and has a decent stretch factor to it. Shows off curves in all the right places. Read more
items.author: Jason

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value and figure flattering
items.body: Fits well, although the fabrics is a bit on the inexpensive side, it’s still a cute dress. It will need to be steamed before wearing because the material has a tendency to wrinkle. It’s comfortable and figure flattering. It’s not see through so I was comfortable wearing it without any cover up. The scrunched midsection helps to camouflage that area perfectly. Great value for a nice semi formal dress that’s cute and inexpensive. Read more
items.author: Mae Lacy

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars High Slit Dress
items.body: Cute strapless high slit dress, it hugs in all the right places for a flattering fit. ✅ Smooth fabric ✅ Curve enhancing design ✅ Good for parties, and events ⚠️ Caution runs slim—check the size chart carefully Read more
items.author: TeShera

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Split High Split Formal Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Split High Split Formal Cocktail is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Navy, Burgundy, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
